title: Disabled people in Sweden 2018 , by disability type
summary: The Disabled Sweden is less pronounced in Other_lasting_physical_or_mental_disabilities_that_are_clearly_not_due_to_normal_aging when compared to the Significant_and_permanent_intellectual_disability_after_brain_damage_in_adult_age_caused_by_external_violence_or_physical_illness and Mental_retardation_autism_or_pervasive_developmental_disorders .

Mental_retardation_autism_or_pervasive_developmental_disorders shows a Sweden of 65191 % , the Significant_and_permanent_intellectual_disability_after_brain_damage_in_adult_age_caused_by_external_violence_or_physical_illness 2096 % , and Other_lasting_physical_or_mental_disabilities_that_are_clearly_not_due_to_normal_aging is at 2096 % .

data.Disability Type: Mental retardation autism or pervasive developmental disorders
Other lasting physical or mental disabilities that are clearly not due to normal aging
Significant and permanent intellectual disability after brain damage in adult age caused by external violence or physical illness

gold: This statistic shows the number of disabled people in Sweden in 2018 , by type of disability accordingly to the Swedish LSS law . That year , there were over 65 thousand people with intellectual disabilities like e.g . autism in Sweden .
